publishAd.question: How can I post a real estate ad?
publishAd.answer: To post an ad, log into your account, click on 'Post an ad,' and fill out the form with your property details: photos, description, price, and features. Your ad will be visible after validation by our team.

fees.question: What are the fees for posting an ad?
fees.answer: Posting an ad is free but limited to 5 photos. For more features, especially for professionals, we offer various annual plans based on the number of ads, photos, and videos per listing. Check our pricing table for more details.

duration.question: How long does my ad stay online?
duration.answer: Ads remain online for 30 days. You can renew them for free before expiration. If an ad is not renewed, it will be automatically archived but will remain accessible in your personal space.

modify.question: How can I edit or delete my ad?
modify.answer: Log into your account and go to the 'My Ads' section. You can edit or delete your ads anytime. Changes are subject to a new validation by our team.

contact.question: How can I contact a seller or an agency?
contact.answer: On each listing, you will find a 'Contact' button that allows you to send a direct message to the seller. You can also save listings to your favorites to find them easily.
